SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="dff337820c254fcc95b137ad2cb565d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You're the one who saved me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you so much![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm from Alayon Academy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dff337820c254fcc95b137ad2cb565d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'm here on the Uncharted Planet Tour with
my Planetary Science Club.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I won the
tickets in a neighborhood raffle.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dff337820c254fcc95b137ad2cb565d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We were about to land, and the spaceship
went haywire...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There was an emergency
evacuation and everything!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="b9b5ab035e274236971ad1a9b1869ea8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]A little while ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was reunited with our
club advisor, Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She looked so
tired...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b9b5ab035e274236971ad1a9b1869ea8" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] are still missing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think
she feels responsible...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's all so awful...
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="934420821b374deda45976ddf08ce647" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I just wish...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wish I hadn't won the special
prize in the raffle and invited everyone
on the tour...
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="9257530b583345d8aaa8a8b597940707" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I've always loved looking at the stars.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I got to high school,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the first thing
I did was form the Planetary Science Club.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9257530b583345d8aaa8a8b597940707" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]There's only three members,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] counting me,
the leader.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was the one who convinced
the other two to join.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="d1aa45001c3647ff80f7900af7da737d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We were evacuated from the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
then the wind blew us in different
directions, and we got separated...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d1aa45001c3647ff80f7900af7da737d" Scale="1"/]I looked for the others as soon as I landed
on the surface.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But I couldn't find anyone![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I got so tired...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]then I just kinda fell asleep...
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="f24f78b355e94cc38aadc09e99a00d93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You found [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f24f78b355e94cc38aadc09e99a00d93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]So that leaves [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She must have
gotten lost...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]somewhere...
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="2c25e0d63e3a4ceba1ca4b571c845887" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] isn't good at sitting still.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She likes
to climb mountains alone and play with
rocks and stuff like that.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="c9019bdb936143bfa98732d0d20078b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]When I decide I want to do something,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
first thing I do is pester everyone around
me until I get my way...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c9019bdb936143bfa98732d0d20078b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But, well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm starting to think maybe my
pushiness...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]is causing a lot of trouble for
some individuals.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="4cf3409e014842bdaa0a1c3d26da6827" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]There's sooo much I have to apologize to
Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] for.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What am I going to do?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4cf3409e014842bdaa0a1c3d26da6827" Scale="1"/]I pushed her into being the adviser for
our club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and then I pushed her even
more to go on this trip...
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="f9a6c5c0c9da4595a2b748a0c2a7d8e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s just grinning away.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She
cannot read the room at all![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f9a6c5c0c9da4595a2b748a0c2a7d8e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]But it's a relief to have her back.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm just
so glad...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't know what to say or how
to say thank you enough.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="52bc71586b2f4846af6c568a569369df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can always talk to teachers and
adults like they're best friends,
or something.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52bc71586b2f4846af6c568a569369df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]She's always smiling like she's having the
best time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] lt's nice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] actually.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Everyone's
in a good mood when she's around.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="df4987408be045259c8af8e4ac1e92f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is calm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]like, adult-level calm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so others think she's our supervisor
all the time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="df4987408be045259c8af8e4ac1e92f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't get me wrong![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not trying
to say that Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] doesn't act like
she's our supervisor or something.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="75792cc4287a4b29a7e86c20ba44b1e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This planet's sooo far from my home that
the sky is full of nebulae and galaxies I've
never even seen before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="75792cc4287a4b29a7e86c20ba44b1e9" Scale="1"/]If I ever come back to this planet again
one day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm going to make sure to bring
my observation equipment!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="a0d214e49afe43d0a627bd54b7f31f36" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is always going out and collecting
minerals,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so she's super strong.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a0d214e49afe43d0a627bd54b7f31f36" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I will all try to lift a box
together...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and FAIL.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will carry it
for us all by herself!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="28e7efb2018f432bb00784c7e79a5822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]No matter how long [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] looks at the sky,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
she never gets tired of it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She loves
meteorology more than anything.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="5524b692c05b4374a1a44489167619e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You should try taking a look at the sky if
you have time to during one of your
night expeditions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5524b692c05b4374a1a44489167619e1" Scale="1"/]This planet's night sky is decorated with
enough stars to compete with my
home planet's sky.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So it's a lot!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="51738bbb365041ecaa58a6fbe9316506" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Our school is hosting a culture festival
soon.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I'll make an exhibit that
features my experiences on this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51738bbb365041ecaa58a6fbe9316506" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]This place is so different from our home![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I feel like my fellow students would really
enjoy learning about life here.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="4967c3ad317e4028bf51a09626b81a00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is always so cool and collected.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Everything she says seems so well-
thought-out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And she's reliable too!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="94beff8210b4402785b9c52c42e76cdb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It was REALLY scary spending the night
alone the day I got stranded.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Looking at
the stars is what calmed me down...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="94beff8210b4402785b9c52c42e76cdb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]The air is so clear here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Compared to my
home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it seems like you can see so many
more stars.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="d44441ad2dbb4e2284bcded11cb60cd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] goes so easy on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
calls her by a nickname. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Like, "Hey, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
How's it going?"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's so inappropriate![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d44441ad2dbb4e2284bcded11cb60cd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she calls her that so much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm afraid I'm going to slip and call
her that too!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="3e5e3b3fc09949a69adefa193e6a0c9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I feel like this whole thing brought
everyone in the Planetary Science
Club closer together.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e5e3b3fc09949a69adefa193e6a0c9a" Scale="1"/]My friends can't be replaced...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know that
better than ever.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So I'm going to make
sure I really appreciate having them.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="d4a22d50b3f0489bba244b74faa2a826" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]When we were evacuating from the ship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] made sure the three of us
escaped first.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d4a22d50b3f0489bba244b74faa2a826" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I thought I might want to be a teacher one
day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but seeing what Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] did for
us...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]now I want to more than ever.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="7b0972d659744462b572b88f43ce5c76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I've always loved looking at the stars.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I got to high school,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the first thing
I did was form the Planetary Science Club.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b0972d659744462b572b88f43ce5c76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]There's only three members,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] counting me,
the leader.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was the one who convinced
the other two to join.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="cd2e65dd1bc64d1aa5a419474ca643c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]When I decide I want to do something,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
first thing I do is pester everyone around
me until I get my way...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cd2e65dd1bc64d1aa5a419474ca643c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But, well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm starting to think maybe my
pushiness...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]is causing a lot of trouble for
some individuals.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="6f0b99c007ec4d488b185a5d3a960137" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This planet's sooo far from my home that
the sky is full of nebulae and galaxies I've
never even seen before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f0b99c007ec4d488b185a5d3a960137" Scale="1"/]If I ever come back to this planet again
one day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm going to make sure to bring
my observation equipment!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="a1dfcaab2f0e49c180d3d13b19a1c0c6" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is always going out and collecting
minerals,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so she's super strong.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a1dfcaab2f0e49c180d3d13b19a1c0c6" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ms. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I will all try to lift a box
together...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and FAIL.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will carry it
for us all by herself!
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="2c1290b56896417db105cd935bc69ec1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]No matter how long [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] looks at the sky,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
she never gets tired of it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She loves
meteorology more than anything.
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="6d9f41463b77488781c7d09b57de0c2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]You are...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
need something?
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="709933eae0604760b6d6e9232a7a4e75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Uhhh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]not gonna eat me...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]right?
SV014.SV014_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal14"/][UE:Meta key="543c778244fe4d4daae642cda34ca095" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Really though,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that face...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a shock to
meet someone who looks so much like me![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="543c778244fe4d4daae642cda34ca095" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]It's like I'm looking in a mirror...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]sort of.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Feels so weird.
